titles: Observations touching the principles of natural motions, and especially touching rarefaction & condensation together with a reply to certain remarks touching the gravitation of fluids / by the author of Difficiles nugae.
author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

notes: The author of Difficiles nugae was Matthew Hale.
